situation.title: Winter sports
situation.meta_description: Rules for winter sports (skiing, cross-country skiing, skating) during the COVID-19 pandemic.

content.processed:
Skiing

At present, there has not been made any final decision on whether the ski resorts will open or not. The rules will be made accordingly to the epidemiological situation closer to the beginning of the ski season.

Ice skating

All indoor and outdoor sports fields are now closed. It is therefore not possible to use artificial ice rinks both indoors and outdoors. However, it will be possible to ice skate on natural ice risk. During such activity, all hygienic rules must be maintained - especially disinfect your hands and keep a distance.

Cross-country skiing

Cross-country skiing is still possible. However, you must maintain all hygienic rules. There is an exception for wearing a face mask during sport, but it is important to keep a two-meters distance from others.
